name: Star Ranger
description:
"The space colony on the remote planet Draxon 7 is under attack from invaders. Your mission: defend the colony for as long as possible and save the colony residents from destruction."

Hi everyone! This game is inspired by the original Star Fox for the Super Nintendo and the Super Scope 6 (Nintendo's bazooka peripheral). Star Ranger is our first 3D game, and we learned a lot in the process of making it! Coopal00ps spent a ton of time recreating the look of the old Super FX Chip, while Pandamander worked on the gameplay.

We hope you enjoy!

GAME CONTROLS
  • Shoot - Right Mouse Click
CREDITS

This game is a collaboration between Coopal00ps and Pandamander, made in 31 days for our game-a-month challenge. Follow us for more games every month: Pandamander: Twitter , Instagram Coopal00ps: Instagram

And thank YOU - THE PLAYER!!
